main event: A UFO was observed in Littleton, Colorado on August 20, 1960, for approximately 20-30 minutes.
interesting points: The object remained stationary during the observation,The sighting led to speculation that it could have been a planet due to its position in the sky,Only one witness was able to provide a description,Multiple attempts to locate other witnesses were unsuccessful,The witness used binoculars to observe the object.
sighted object: a stationary light in the sky
witness description: An observer who reported seeing a bright light in the sky.
